title: 852. Psalm 63:1-5
verses:
O God, You are our God.
Earnestly we seek You today.
Our souls thirst for You,
our whole being longs for You.

Because we have seen You in the sanctuary
and beheld Your power and glory, we can respond.

Lord, Your love is better than life itself,
and we declare that our lips will glorify You.

We will praise You as long as we live,
and in Your name we will lift up
our hands to do Your work.

Lord we will be satisfied if
You feed us,
and we will now sing praises to Your name.
